product.title: 111 State Rotating Hot Air Comb Electric Hair Straightener Brush Hair Curler Hair Dryer Brush  Negative Ion Hair Styler Comb

product.description: Rotating Roller Brush Multifunction Electric Hot Air Hair Brush Hair Dryer Comb Professional Hair Curling Roller Wand Salon Hot Air Brush Styler Straightener Curler Comb
product.description_html:
Rotating Roller Brush
Multifunction Electric Hot Air Hair Brush Hair Dryer Comb
Professional Hair Curling Roller Wand
Salon Hot Air Brush Styler Straightener Curler Comb
product.description_full:
Rotating Roller Brush Multifunction Electric Hot Air Hair Brush Hair Dryer Comb Professional Hair Curling Roller Wand Salon Hot Air Brush Styler Straightener Curler Comb Package Content: 1 x hand shank 2 x replaceable heads 
Features: 【1】Revolutionized Your Hair-game Time: You can make your hair light, anti-tangle, bringing silky shine and texture with this hot air brush instead of blow dryer. 
【2】Versatile Hot Air Brush:Perfect for plumping blow dryers, brushes, straighteners and curlers. Compact and easy to create beautiful hairstyles. Easily creates volume in hair, straightens, frizzes and dries hair. 
【3】Hot Air Brush:2 speed and 3 heat settings for your styling flexibility. blow dryer brush is beginner friendly and can be placed closer to the scalp for lift. 
【4】Ionic Technology: Negative ions anion hair dryer diffuser technology design .Negative ions can penetrate the hair quickly to help lock in moisture, nourish damaged hair, reduce frizz and static for smoother, shinier hair. 
【5】Brush hair dryer with ceramic coating distributes heat evenly for faster drying time. 
【6】The hot air brush creates rich curls for a more effective, moisturized and radiant hair. 
【7】Multifunctional hair dryer brush, fit for drying, curling a variety of hair styles. 
【8】 Users Friendly Design:Anti-scald bristles design, 360°tangle-free rotation cord, suitable for travel and business trip.
product.description_full_html:
Rotating Roller Brush Multifunction Electric Hot Air Hair Brush Hair Dryer Comb Professional Hair Curling Roller Wand Salon Hot Air Brush Styler Straightener Curler Comb
Package Content:
1 x hand shank
2 x replaceable heads

Features:
【1】Revolutionized Your Hair-game Time: You can make your hair light, anti-tangle, bringing silky shine and texture with this hot air brush instead of blow dryer.

【2】Versatile  Hot Air Brush:Perfect for plumping blow dryers, brushes, straighteners and curlers.                Compact and easy to create beautiful hairstyles.                Easily creates volume in hair, straightens, frizzes and dries hair.

【3】Hot Air Brush:2 speed and 3 heat settings for your styling flexibility. blow dryer brush is beginner friendly and can be placed closer to the scalp for lift.

【4】Ionic Technology: Negative ions anion hair dryer diffuser technology design .Negative ions can penetrate the hair quickly to help lock in moisture, nourish damaged hair, reduce frizz and static for smoother, shinier hair.

【5】Brush hair dryer with ceramic coating distributes heat evenly for faster drying time.

【6】The hot air brush creates rich curls for a more effective, moisturized and radiant hair.

【7】Multifunctional hair dryer brush, fit for drying, curling a variety of hair styles.

【8】 Users Friendly Design:Anti-scald bristles design, 360°tangle-free rotation cord, suitable for travel and business trip.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
